title: Monster Meat
summaries: The Monster Meat is a pet-summoning item which summons a Pig Man pet that follows the player around. The Monster Meat can be dropped from most Corruption or Crimson enemies with a 1/1500 (0.07%) chance. On The Constant seed, the drop rate is increased to a 1/500 (0.2%) chance.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a small Pig Man
'Gross. It's full of hairs.'
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
